system.descriptionText: No Test to Install or Remove, can easily be rolled up and stored on the hull when not in use. When in use all Tests to spot the Vehicle have -30. Doesn't hide a vehicle moving and shooting. If Vehicle catches on fire while netting in use, roll 1d10, on 5 or less camo netting catches on fire, and becomes unusable until repaired.
